name: Master Key
description: The master key unlocks all employee-only areas in the store. Found in the security office on the second floor, hidden inside a locked drawer. Essential for accessing restricted zones and finding better loot.

name: Heavy-Duty Flashlight
description: A powerful flashlight that illuminates dark areas and can temporarily blind enemies. Essential for navigating the store after the lights go out. Batteries last for 6 hours of continuous use.

name: First Aid Kit
description: Restores 50 HP and removes bleeding status. Can be found in the pharmacy section, usually behind the counter. Limited supply, use wisely.

name: Energy Drink
description: Temporarily increases stamina regeneration by 50% for 10 minutes. Found scattered throughout the beverage aisles. Useful for extended exploration sessions.

name: Crowbar
description: A versatile tool that can be used as a weapon or to pry open locked doors and crates. Deals moderate damage and has a chance to stun enemies. Found in the hardware section.

name: Security Badge
description: Grants access to the security room and surveillance system. Found in the lost & found box at customer service. Allows you to view camera feeds and disable alarms.

name: Walkie-Talkie
description: Allows communication with other survivors (if multiplayer) or receives emergency broadcasts. Can also be used to distract enemies by playing static noise.

name: Tactical Backpack
description: Increases inventory capacity by 20 slots. Essential for hoarding supplies and items. Found in the outdoor/camping section.

name: Lockpick Set
description: Allows you to pick locks on doors and containers. Has limited uses but can be found in multiple locations. Skill-based minigame determines success rate.

name: Night Vision Goggles
description: Provides clear vision in complete darkness. Extremely rare item found in the electronics section. Battery lasts 4 hours. Game-changing for night exploration.

name: Canned Food
description: Restores 30 HP and 20 hunger. Found in abundance in the grocery section. Basic survival food that doesn't expire.

name: Duct Tape
description: Versatile crafting material. Can be used to repair items, create makeshift weapons, or seal doors temporarily. Found throughout the hardware section.

name: Generator Fuel
description: Fuel for the backup generator. Restores power to sections of the store for 30 minutes. Found in the automotive section. Limited quantity.

name: Security Camera Access Code
description: A code written on a sticky note found in the manager's office. Grants access to the security camera system when combined with the security badge.

name: Emergency Radio
description: Receives emergency broadcasts and weather updates. Can also be used to call for help (if that's an option). Found in electronics, requires batteries.

name: Aluminum Baseball Bat
description: A sturdy baseball bat that deals good damage and has a chance to knock enemies back. Found in the sports section. Reliable melee weapon.

name: Water Bottle
description: Restores 40 thirst. Essential for survival. Found throughout the beverage aisles. Can be refilled at water fountains.

name: Climbing Rope
description: Can be used to climb to higher floors, create escape routes, or tie down objects. Found in the outdoor/camping section. 50 feet long.

name: Fire Extinguisher
description: Can be used to put out fires or as an improvised weapon. Found mounted on walls throughout the store. Limited uses but effective.

name: Store Layout Map
description: A detailed map of the entire store showing all sections, exits, and key locations. Essential for navigation. Found at customer service or information desks.

name: Emergency Exit Key
description: Unlocks all emergency exits. Found in the security office key cabinet. Critical for escaping the store when needed.
